name: digital_recipe_box
description: REST API for Digital Recipe Box
author: CSE341 Team-12

scripts.test:swagger: PORT=3000 NODE_ENV=production node server.js && echo 'Visit http://localhost:3000/api-docs/ to test Swagger with relative paths'
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run test:ci
scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run docs && npm run test:coverage && npm run verify
scripts.clean: rm -rf coverage/ && rm -rf node_modules/.cache/ && rm -rf ~/.cache/mongodb-binaries/ && rm -rf /tmp/mongodb-binaries/ || true
scripts.verify: npm run test:ci && npm run health-check
scripts.health-check: node -e "console.log('âœ… Build verification passed - all systems ready!')"
scripts.validate: npm run test && echo 'âœ… All tests passed - ready for deployment!'
